metadata.title: CVE-2020-6472 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Insufficient policy enforcement in developer tools in Google Chrome priorto 83.0.4103.61 allowed an attacker who convinced a user to install amalicious extension to obtain potentially sensitive information fromprocess memory or disk via a crafted Chrome Extension.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
